vote.title: Authorize the City Manager to execute a one-year Contract with two one-year renewal options, approved as to form by the City Attorney, with GrantWorks, Inc. and/or its affiliate (Contractor) for the administration, management and implementation, pursuant to the City’s Comprehensive Housing Policy (CHP) and the CDBG Regulations (as defined in the Contract), of portions of the Major Home Rehabilitation Program and the Home Reconstruction Program (the Programs) (collectively, the Services), in an amount not to exceed $3,737,000.00 - Not to Exceed $3,737,000.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the City Manager to execute a one-year Contract with two one-year renewal options, approved as to form by the City Attorney, with GrantWorks, Inc. and/or its affiliate (Contractor) for the administration, management and implementation, pursuant to the City’s Comprehensive Housing Policy (CHP) and the CDBG Regulations (as defined in the Contract), of portions of the Major Home Rehabilitation Program and the Home Reconstruction Program (the Programs) (collectively, the Services), in an amount not to exceed $3,737,000.00 - Not to Exceed $3,737,000.00 - Financing: Community Development Block Grant Funds
